title: The U.S.’ Best Off-Road Racers Don’t Want to Race Gravel. They Just Want the Same Hype
content:
U.S. cross-country mountain biking had a banner year in the World Cup and Olympics. What would take the sport to the next level? 'Americanize it in the best way so there are more fans,' says Christopher Blevins.

Read the full article at The U.S.’ Best Off-Road Racers Don’t Want to Race Gravel. They Just Want the Same Hype on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
